participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Shy but passionate about singing, often struggles with anxiety in social situations.
participant_1.background: I was accepted to participate. I am a shy person but I love to sing. Anyways, I decided to give it a try and participated in an audition for a talent show. My shyness made me panic and I did not show up. Until recently I have never been able to sing in front of anyone.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, always seeking new connections and experiences.
participant_2.background: My guilty pleasure is McDonald's. I sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends. I am the youngest of 8 kids. I have a close circle of friends I would do anything for. I never stop looking for love.

content.text: I am a shy person but i love to sing. I was accepted to participate in an audition for a talent show. My shyness made me panick and i did not show up.
That's too bad. I love to sing too. I don't mind being in front of an audience.
I'm glad you're not shy about it. I've always wanted to be able to sing in front of people, but I just get so nervous.
Maybe you could try singing in front of a small group of friends or family first. That might help you get more comfortable with it.
That's a good idea. I'll try that. Thanks for the advice.
No problem. I'm always happy to help.
So, what do you do for a living?
I sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends.
That sounds like a lot of work.
It is, but it's worth it. I love my job.
I'm glad you like it. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love meeting new people and helping them find their dream homes.
That's really nice. I'm sure you're great at your job.
Thank you. I try my best.
So, you're the youngest of 8 kids?
Yes, I am.
Wow, that must have been a lot of fun growing up.
It was! I always had someone to play with.
That's great. I'm an only child, so I always wished I had a sibling.
You're not missing out on anything. It can be a lot of work having a bunch of siblings.
I'm sure it can be. But it also sounds like it can be a lot of fun.
It can be. I'm glad I grew up with a big family.
